contents:
500 America whipped the British (twice), we whipped the Spanish, the Germans, the Japanese, the Italians and anyone else who threatened our way of life in this country. If domestic Communists are the next challenge, we'll whip them as well. No fear. No surrender. Never back down. posted 4 days ago by MEME-SUPREME 35 comments award share report block John Rich🇺🇸 @johnrich • 4d America whipped the British (twice), we whipped the Spanish, the Germans, the Japanese, the Italians and anyone else who threatened our way of life in this country. If domestic Communists are the next challenge, we'll whip them as well. No fear. No surrender. Never back down.

No prisoners. permalink award report block reply MeMargie 7 points 4 days ago Godspeed. permalink award report block reply Alphahorizon 7 points 4 days ago Lets throw some goat fuckers in that mix as well. permalink award report block reply Deplorable_Citizen 7 points 4 days ago I dunno, the commies seem to be winning so far: Their fundraisers and financiers of Antifa and other such chaos nationwide (Open Societies Foundation, Clinton Foundation, scumbags at the WHO and WEF, etc.) haven't been mass-arrested and put on trial yet. The Epstein victims are having to out their own client list together because Trump refuses to do it for whatever reason. Antifa has not been sufficiently been snuffed out and ground into dust, despite drive-bys and other attempts at attacking ICE/DHS/Border Patrol RINOs still refuse to end the Filibuster, despite Trump's warning that the Dems will do the same thing Day 1 when they retake power in both houses in Congress and the Presidency. Mamdani and Dems win because Rs give no counters (other than "muh communism bad") despite Capitalism being vastly superior and not promoting Capitalism's good qualities (via TV, radio, social media and internet ad blitzes, etc.) while Main Street struggles with debts and lack of capital wealth build-up despite the gains made on Wall Street. Anthony Fauci and his ilk are still allowed to walk free after they committed global genocide and got rich from it. Trump still refuses to do what Nayib Bukele did to free El Salvador from tyranny (aka mass-arrest activist judges who seem to self-appoint themselves as gods). permalink award report block reply keeman 4 points 3 days ago We have been on the slow road to communism since 1930s.  Still waiting for some swamp draining (or anything remotely useful to stop the communist takeover). permalink parent award report block reply staroframphansbhole 6 points 4 days ago Yeah I don’t think we should brag about participating in a war in which we explicitly allied with communists and which literally propagated communism for nearly a century, but if you’re a retarded faggot who drinks boomer armchair twitter tough guy posts as much as you drink synagogue semen, it makes sense why you would post something so retarded permalink award report block reply keeman 5 points 3 days ago Don't forget, we also gave China to Mao in WW2. Empires measure themselves against how they fare against other nations.  Republics don't spend any time on this crap. permalink award report block reply godgoldnguns 1 points 4 days ago We will not defeat them unless we repent.
